plot: An exploration of Zen and the art of video tourism. John Fillwalk, renowned for his video installation work, discusses his approach to his work against breathtaking scenery in Northern Arizona and Southern Utah.
title: Walking in the Valley of the Gods
plot_es: An exploration of Zen and the art of video tourism. John Fillwalk, renowned for his video installation work, discusses his approach to his work against breathtaking scenery in Northern Arizona and Southern Utah.
original_name: Walking in the Valley of the Gods
